description: Global limits ability to place concurrent calls using flat rate trunks

allow_postpay.description: Permit postpay settings on accounts by default

allow_prepay.description: Permit prepay settings on accounts by default

authz_resource_types.description: List of Resource-Types that will authorize the call; bypassing limit checks and billing per account by default

burst_trunks.description: A hard limit for number of burst trunks permitted per account by default

calls.description: A hard limit for the total number calls per account by default

enabled.description: Determines if the limits should be enforced on accounts by default

inbound_trunks.description: A hard limit for the number of inbound trunks per account by default

max_postpay_ammount.description: A hard limit for the postpay before limiting calls per account by default

outbound_trunks.description: A hard limit for the number of outbound trunks per account by default

reserve_ammount.description: The amount to hold in reserve per account by default

resource_consuming_calls.description: A hard limit for the number of resource consuming calls per account by default

soft_limit_inbound.description: Permit calls on inbound calls accounts which have exceeded the limit per account by default

soft_limit_outbound.description: Permit calls on outbound calls for accounts which have exceeded the limit per account by default

twoway_trunks.description: A hard limit for the number of twoway trunks per account by default
